Description: Whether logger is enabled or not
Logger name. Must be empty or unique for each logger type
List of allowed events, comma separated. If declared, 'Deny events' setting will be ignored
List of denied events, comma separated
Whether logging is enabled or not

Enabling this mode you grant that your application has single thread model and IPLogger will use non-blocking operations.
Enable this mode to increase logger performance
Configuration file will be monitored for changes. All changes will be applied on the fly
